RJ, why not buy a buy for yourself, and just talk with them yourself, they =
 
are really all around us, we just can't see their world because we are 
i=
nside  this physical body, that blocks their world out. sf
 
 
In a message=
 dated 8/22/2010 11:23:06 A.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
rasterer@... =
writes:

 
 
 
Oh I am not making any claims.  Just testing claims  I've he=
ard.
If the claim is that spirits cannot know things that the  human operat=
or 
cannot know, or spirits can travel astrally to anywhere,  or spirits ca=
n tell 
us the future (spirits, or whatever is claimed to  speak through th=
e box) 
then maybe my experiments will help me form a  conclusion one way o=
r the other 
there, that is not based on stories I've  heard, but the best =
objective 
procedures I can come up with.

---  On Sun, 8/22/10, SnowfireL@=
aol.com  <SnowfireL@...> wrote:


From:  SnowfireL@... <SnowfireL@a=
ol.com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC]  Scamp,
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Su=
nday, August 22,  2010, 8:11 AM


 
RJ, why don't you go over to Franks hou=
se and let us all know  what he is 
eating for his breakfast?  See...asking=
 a spirit is  doing the same 
thing...they are only people too.  :)  sf
 
 =

In a message dated 8/22/2010 11:09:54 A.M. Eastern Standard  Time, 
raster=
er@... writes:

 
No problem Snowfire.  Since I don't  believe (at le=
ast not yet) the same 
things as everyone here,  it just saves time if I as=
sume anything that looks 
like an  argument is directed at me. ;)


--- On =
Sun,  8/22/10, SnowfireL@...  <SnowfireL@...> wrote:


From:  Snowf=
ireL@... <SnowfireL@...>
Subject: Re:  [EVP-ITC] Scamp,
To: EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups.com
Date:  Sunday, August 22, 2010, 7:56 AM


 
RJ, I did not =
mean it to be,  I was just sending my Scamp bark to the list 
in general, d=
id  not direct it to you, sorry. sf
 
 
In a message dated 8/22/2010  9:20:=
39 A.M. Eastern Standard Time, 
rasterer@...  writes:

 

Experimenta=
l data in controlled  conditions, and personal anecdotes, are 
not the same=
  thing,


--- On Sun, 8/22/10, Frank  Sumption  <purplealiengirl@...=
>  wrote:


From:  Frank Sumption  <purplealiengirl@...>
Subject: Re:=
  [EVP-ITC] Scamp,
To:  EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Sunday, August  22, 2=
010, 12:21 AM

 
 
If you completely ignore what everyone  else in the whol=
e wide freaking 
world gets via  EVP, various photography and ITC methods, =
and just  chance 
encounters, then yeah, you probably don't  have any data,=
 and won't have any 
data no matter  what. 
 
F-S


On  Sat, Aug 21, 2010 a=
t 3:42 PM, Rick Wegrzyn <rickwegrzyn@...>  
wrote:

 
 
 
 
 
Hey RJ,=
I think we need to go to the  cemetary and see what you get  
there....


 =

____________________________________
 From: Rj  <rasterer@...>  

To=
: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com

Sent: Sat,  August 21, 2010 2:29:36 PM  

Subjec=
t:  Re: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,



I don't think I have enough data  yet to make a=
ny conclusions, so I plan 
more  experiments.  Since there are different  d=
istinct claims about what the 
box or the  recorders can do, I try to make =
different  distinct experiments 
for each.

Some  people claim they can get=
 the box to tell them  things that the 
operator couldn't know, so my  "wha=
ts the object" experiment is one way to  
examine that.  Some people claim =
the boxes  can make predictions, so cataloging 
predictions  and examining =
the results can help examine  that.  If there are 
other claims, I will  tr=
y to figure experiments based on  those.

--- On Sat, 8/21/10, Frank  Sumpt=
ion <purplealiengirl@...>  wrote:


From:  Frank Sumption <purplealie=
ngirl@...>
Subject:  Re: [EVP-ITC] Scamp,
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com=

Date:  Saturday, August 21, 2010, 12:48 PM


 
I get our last dogs from ti=
me to  time, and used to get them via white  
noise when I first started th=
is. Last  summer some kids came down into the 
basement  wiht the younger g=
randson, and the little yorkie  barked, but "get 
outta here" came out, som=
e how.  

Yeah, I think I was too hard on RJ. I  don't know why, but testin=
g doens't 
seem to  work, but we get enough to prove this to  ourselves. It=
's probably 
a faith thing, although  I'm not religious, even anti-religion=
.   

F-S
 



On Fri, Aug 20, 2010 at 6:27 PM, <SnowfireL@...>  wrote:=


 
 
 
[_Attachment(s)_ 
(https://mail.google.com/mail/?ui=3D2&view=3Djs&n=
ame=3Dmain,tlist&ver=3D9oD1J7yvz5o.en.&am=3D!xONyw1plirqxhZ4a1PIWg1xlTveuJ8=
oWIzqJ6mz0Dt83ht4Zrp4
&fri#12a920b21a6295da_TopText)   from SnowfireL@aol.c=
om  included below]  
Here is a short file, where someone says,  "Scamp, Sc=
amp," then Scamp 
barks. "yap."   This little dog belonged to my grandma, w=
hen I  was about 9 or 10 
years old, he was a Manchester  Terrier, and live=
d with us for many years, 
and  this is his bark for sure.  I'd know that  =
bark anywhere.  Sorry, that 
I can't make it  any clearer, I need to get on=
e of those better  ghost boxes 
I guess.  RJ, spirits are  just like us, th=
ey are not omnipresent like  
God,  probably why David doesn't want  to pla=
y the guessing game, he has better 
things  to do over there, and has said,=
 they have  thousands of people 
standing in this long line  waiting to get=
 into the Heavens, and He can't  just 
drop His job and go to your house to=
 see  what you have over there, He did 
tell me that  first time what it wa=
s, and i sent it to you,  but it was too 
late.  It's hard for me to  under=
stand them sometimes, He was also right  
about that little boy, Syler bein=
g killed, and  where his body would be found, 
I don't know what  they did =
about it though. sf
